title: Goose with Orange Glaze
ingredients: ['4 goose breasts', 'salt to taste', '1 dash dry vermouth', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest', '1 orange, juiced', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/4 teaspoon caraway seeds']
